title: VEGA_SPORT
author: VEGA_SPORT
content: You can buy any coin you want, but do your due diligence before choosing any coin. If I had to suggest to you which coin to buy, then you can refer to Vega Sport.They have a decentralized sports betting platform with odds that update every 3 seconds for users. All odds and betting values are operated by smart contracts on the blockchain for public transparency and no one can interfere. I experienced it at https://vegasport.io/ and found it very easy to use. You can bet on any team you love.In addition to a community that loves sports, Vega Sport has also been KYC. They have rewards for holders from betting transactions from the systems.It has a lot of potential when the World Cup is approaching, hopefully, a big boom. What do you think about this token? Let me know your thoughts

comments.author: irhact
comments.body: Quote from: VEGA_SPORT on November 19, 2022, 07:54:44 AMYou can buy any coin you want, but do your due diligence before choosing any coin. If I had to suggest to you which coin to buy, then you can refer to Vega Sport.We're in a bear market so no matter what's happening in the world, the cryptocurrency market will be bearish. It doesn't matter if the world cup gets an official coins they want to used as payment options or endorsed, if Bitcoin isn't receiving any attention, altcoins gets no attention as well or in the case of some hype flowing around then the hype will be short lived because the whole market is in deceasing trend. Assuming the world cup was happening in a bullish period then we would had seens some major pumps in the market especially with projects that are associated with sporting events like football but that's not happening.For now, I'll advise everyone to avoid all altcoins especially those created for just the world cup or associated with it because immediately the world cup ends, those projects will dump as people will no longer see the use of holding those tokens.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: It looks like the token came from the casino, like any other token casino. They use the token for the World Cup but I don't see that token related to the World Cup but rather a casino token like the others.If you want to buy it, go ahead but we don't know whether the token will increase or not. But the casino token has to compete with other casino tokens that gamblers have started to recognize and it's not easy.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Why don't you just use the casino site itself that has already popular instead of using token issued by suspicious party that doesn't have good reputation? World cup token was just a shit scam token that will be useless token after world cup will be ended. Owned this piece of shit pretty much the same like you have been fooled by scammers. Why do you make yourself even more complicated with it? I never see any review about that site. Probably a site that has possibility to scam people. World cup token was just hype token that will be only exist for a month. It will not even more than it. It's caused by this token has no purpose rather than become money grabber by stupid people who bought it with their money. The world cup token was actually useless token. The is the truth. It offers nothing.

If I had to suggest to you which coin to buy, then you can refer to Vega Sport.They have a decentralized sports betting platform with odds that update every 3 seconds for users. All odds and betting values are operated by smart contracts on the blockchain for public transparency and no one can interfere. I experienced it at https://vegasport.io/ and found it very easy to use. You can bet on any team you love.In addition to a community that loves sports, Vega Sport has also been KYC. They have rewards for holders from betting transactions from the systems.It has a lot of potential when the World Cup is approaching, hopefully, a big boom. What do you think about this token? Let me know your thoughts   Never heard of this token before and a quick google search doesn't bring a lot of extra information also. I mainly find something about Vega protocol but that seems another coin? I would be very careful investing in Vega Sport and it might boom because of the world cup but it could also do nothing.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: The reply to the question you asked in the title of your thread. No, they shouldn't. The World Cup will be over soon and this heap of garbage, in the form of fan tokens, will be useless again, especially now it is a very difficult time for cryptocurrency, and various dubious projects are rapidly losing their value. I still believe that fan tokens are needed only for short-term speculation and they have no future in portfolios of investors on longer timeframes. These tokens have no fundamentals, which means no powerful support and usage.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: If you can afford the risk then why not? Just remember that this is just seasonal toke and the world cup will end soon, hopefully by that time you already have profit and sold the token because it will be useless once the world cup is over. I’ve seen some token already made a good pump, maybe you can just look at those token. Personally, I don’t prefer to buy these kind of token, I’d rather place a bet on every games than to buy that token.

comments.author: Ludmilla_rose1995
comments.body: looks like the OP is marketing the Vega Sport site!alluding to whether gambling site tokens or other world cup backed tokens have long-term potential,, I don't think so. when the world cup ends, we will see the price of the token go down. but if you really like to want to take risks in these investments then please try, but still at your own risk.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: Ludmilla_rose1995 on November 23, 2022, 06:10:47 PMlooks like the OP is marketing the Vega Sport site!alluding to whether gambling site tokens or other world cup backed tokens have long-term potential,, I don't think so. when the world cup ends, we will see the price of the token go down. but if you really like to want to take risks in these investments then please try, but still at your own risk.He's certainly marketing that website.But if you go through with it and try to click the tabs, they're not working at all. I have no idea if OP and their staff and developers are aware of that.Before launching, there should be a test so that things and buttons will be checked if they're working so that it won't be looking that it's made too quick just to be launched and be on time just as the World Cup.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: Ludmilla_rose1995 on November 23, 2022, 06:10:47 PMlooks like the OP is marketing the Vega Sport site!alluding to whether gambling site tokens or other world cup backed tokens have long-term potential,, I don't think so. when the world cup ends, we will see the price of the token go down. but if you really like to want to take risks in these investments then please try, but still at your own risk.Not advisable at all, seasonal token wont last and that could be more risky for you.Maybe OP is really trying to market that site and I suggest to many that you do your research first before buying any token that are related to world cup maybe some of them are a scam project and will rug pull after this event, so better not to expose yourself from this kind of scheme.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: crzy on November 24, 2022, 09:38:46 PMQuote from: Ludmilla_rose1995 on November 23, 2022, 06:10:47 PMlooks like the OP is marketing the Vega Sport site!alluding to whether gambling site tokens or other world cup backed tokens have long-term potential,, I don't think so. when the world cup ends, we will see the price of the token go down. but if you really like to want to take risks in these investments then please try, but still at your own risk.Not advisable at all, seasonal token wont last and that could be more risky for you.Maybe OP is really trying to market that site and I suggest to many that you do your research first before buying any token that are related to world cup maybe some of them are a scam project and will rug pull after this event, so better not to expose yourself from this kind of scheme. Good point here if the token serves a specific purpose and its for event only, its too risky to buy it and hold for long term. You can play short or trade it but not to hold it for long term. There are tokens that are related to football already reached their peak, and I’m sure it will dump sooner or later so if you still have the chance to take profit, do it now. Take the risk if you can afford it, if not then better to place a bet and watch the games.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: What happens when the world cup is over then?Does that mean the entire token is useless or still have other purposes, does it mean when the world cup over the token dump to the investors or the buyer?This reminded me of a project called santa coin, they solely design and meant for Xmas and I asked in the group, what happens when the Xmas is over does it mean no future for the project as well and then they said nothing much reasonable and believe me or not today the project is dead.Even if people were to invest in the token doesn't mean you should advise them to do so let it be they found out the features and reason to do before they could or your project should have a better stability.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on November 26, 2022, 02:27:06 AMWhat happens when the world cup is over then?Does that mean the entire token is useless or still have other purposes, does it mean when the world cup over the token dump to the investors or the buyer?This reminded me of a project called santa coin, they solely design and meant for Xmas and I asked in the group, what happens when the Xmas is over does it mean no future for the project as well and then they said nothing much reasonable and believe me or not today the project is dead.Even if people were to invest in the token doesn't mean you should advise them to do so let it be they found out the features and reason to do before they could or your project should have a better stability.Such tokens are useless even now, it is just that with the excitement the world cup is generating all over the world scammers are taking advantage of this to try to get unsuspecting victims to invest on their shitcoins.And since  a lot of people do not care about anything but to make money they try their luck with those coins despite our warnings, something that I personally find regrettable, as I can understand that losing money is inevitable and it can happen to anyone even when they invest in a good asset, but losing money when investing in a shitcoin is unforgivable.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: Ludmilla_rose1995 on November 23, 2022, 06:10:47 PMlooks like the OP is marketing the Vega Sport site!No doubt. He was more frequent to talk about vega sport rather than world cup tokens. That proves if he was one of shilers from vega sports. Quote from: Ludmilla_rose1995 on November 23, 2022, 06:10:47 PMalluding to whether gambling site tokens or other world cup backed tokens have long-term potential,, I don't think so. when the world cup ends, we will see the price of the token go down. but if you really like to want to take risks in these investments then please try, but still at your own risk.The world cup token being created due to the hype only. it's not more than a useless garbage token. The token will be dumped to the bottom once the world cup will have ended. People who bought this kind of tokens were not supporting the team from their nation but they are gambling with the volatility of token. It has low volume and big spread that makes the token become very volatile at this moment.
